trends: There have been no other sightings in Grand Blanc Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright orange light extremely fast, just over the tree tops.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking my dog out and noticed a very fast bright orange light heading west . It was golfball size and was right at the treetops. This was to fast for an aircraft and what stood out was the speed, elevation and brightness of the craft. It was out of my vision within a few seconds due to the tree tops. Very bright ! Not landing lights.
